sources.title: The Exterminator (1945)
sources.description: Gandy Goose, now in the pest-extermination business takes the job of ridding his friend's house of mice. Everything he tries backfires on him and the goosey one is soon gone and the mice are still playing. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-exterminator-1945/

metadata.Plot: Gandy Goose, now in the pest-extermination business takes the job of ridding his friend's house of mice. Everything he tries backfires on him and the goosey one is soon gone and the mice are still playing.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
